allow: Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" auth login --web --git-protocol https --hostname github.com)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine/actions/permissions --method PUT --field enabled=true --field allowed_actions=all)

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine/actions/permissions/workflow --method PUT --field default_workflow_permissions=write --field can_approve_pull_request_reviews=true)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine/environments/development/deployment-branch-policies --method POST --field name=develop --field type=branch)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine/environments/staging/deployment-branch-policies --method POST --field name='v*' --field type=tag)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine/environments/production/deployment-branch-policies --method POST --field name='v*' --field type=tag)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" repo view melegattip/giia-core-engine --json visibility,isPrivate)

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine/branches/main/protection --method PUT --raw-field required_status_checks='{""strict"":false,""contexts"":[]}' --raw-field enforce_admins=null --raw-field required_pull_request_reviews='{""required_approving_review_count"":2,""dismiss_stale_reviews"":true}' --raw-field restrictions=null --raw-field required_linear_history='{""enabled"":true}' --raw-field allow_force_pushes=null --raw-field allow_deletions=null --raw-field required_conversation_resolution='{""enabled"":true}')
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine/branches/main/protection --method PUT --input branch-protection-main.json)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine/branches/develop/protection --method PUT --input branch-protection-develop.json)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine --jq '{visibility: .visibility, actions_enabled: .has_actions, environments: ""check_environments""}')

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine/branches/main/protection --jq '{branch: ""main"", requires_pr: .required_pull_request_reviews.required_approving_review_count, linear_history: .required_linear_history.enabled, conversation_resolution: .required_conversation_resolution.enabled}')

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" api repos/melegattip/giia-core-engine/branches/develop/protection --jq '{branch: ""develop"", requires_pr: .required_pull_request_reviews.required_approving_review_count, linear_history: .required_linear_history.enabled, conversation_resolution: .required_conversation_resolution.enabled}')

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" pr checks 51 --repo melegattip/giia-core-engine)
Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" run list --repo melegattip/giia-core-engine --limit 3)
